allOf.description: An admin representation of the ads displayed on the homepage

tag.description: An identifiable name for the ad

approved.description: Whether the item has been approved

person.description: ID of the person who owns the item

approvedBy.description: ID of the person who approved the item

PublicAd.description: A public representation of the ads displayed on the homepage

url.description: The link to follow when the ad is clicked

LoginRequest.description: A request to log in a user

RegisterRequest.description: A request to register a new user

email.description: The email address of the new user

password.description: The password for the new user

firstName.description: The first name of the new user

middleName.description: The middle name of the new user

lastName.description: The last name of the new user

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the new user

state.description: The 2 letter state code of the new user

country.description: The 2 letter country code of the new user

tz.description: The IANA timezone of the new user

EventInvite.description: An event associated with a tournament invite

id.description: The unique identifier for the file

published.description: Whether the file is published or not

updatedAt.description: When the file was last modified

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

instance.description: A URI reference to the specific occurrence.

BackupRequest.description: A request to create a backup for a tournament or part of a tournament

scope.description: Defines what part of the tournament to back up

id.description: The ID of the category, event, or school being backed up (required when scope type is not "tournament")

options.description: Optional flags that affect how the backup is generated

id.description: The unique identifier for the tournament

city.description: The city where the tournament is held

state.description: The state where the tournament is held

country.description: The country where the tournament is held

tz.description: The IANA timezone of the tournament location

webName.description: The web name of the tournament

start.description: The start date and time of the tournament

end.description: The end date and time of the tournament

regStart.description: The registration start date and time of the tournament

regEnd.description: The registration end date and time of the tournament

id.description: The unique identifier for the contact person

first.description: The first name of the contact person

middle.description: The middle name of the contact person

last.description: The last name of the contact person

email.description: The email address of the contact person

TournRequest.description: A request to create or update a Tournament

city.description: The city where the tournament is held

state.description: The state where the tournament is held

country.description: The country where the tournament is held

tz.description: The IANA timezone of the tournament location

webName.description: The web name of the tournament

start.description: The start date and time of the tournament

end.description: The end date and time of the tournament

regStart.description: The registration start date and time of the tournament

regEnd.description: The registration end date and time of the tournament

sitewide.description: Whether the page is visible sitewide

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the page was last modified

NotFound.description: NotFound - the requested resource was not found or you do not have access.

value.title: Not Found
value.detail: The requested resource foo with ID bar was not found.

value.title: Unauthorized
value.detail: You are not authorized to access this resource.
